title: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: When using the java editor, the process of reverting the file contents is significantly slower compared to closing and reopening the file.
EB: This seems odd, since reverting the file contents should not take more time than simply closing and reopening the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a file in the java editor.
2. Make changes to the file.
3. Click on the 'Revert' option in the editor.
4. Notice the slow response time of the revert process compared to closing and reopening the file.
